channel.title: School on vtsuki.net
channel.description: Recent content in School on vtsuki.net

item.title: FundzForFun
item.description:
A school project to promote financial literacy through a gamified website, including instructions and presentation materials.

  • School project (Corporate Finance and Advisory Services module)
  • Objective was to increase financial literacy via gamification
  • The presentation of the game was done through a website
  • View website here

item.title: North East Virtual Heritage Trail
item.description:
An inter-school competition project to design and develop the North East Virtual Heritage Trail website, featuring interactive maps, galleries, quizzes, and dynamic content. Awarded 1st runner up.

  • Opportunity to participate in Singapore North East Virtual Heritage Trail inter-school website competition organized by Temasek Polytechnic and North East Community Development Council
  • Developed and designed overall website while content was developed by team members
  • Won 1st runner up
  • HTML4, JS
